channel.title: CVE Feed for Illumina -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Illumina -- all products

item.title: CVE-2022-1518|2024-09-16T19:52:33.830Z -- illumina -- nextseq%20550dx
item.description: LRM contains a directory traversal vulnerability that can allow a malicious actor to upload outside the intended directory structure.

item.title: CVE-2022-1519|2024-09-16T18:12:48.155Z -- illumina -- nextseq%20550dx
item.description: LRM does not restrict the types of files that can be uploaded to the affected product. A malicious actor can upload any file type, including executable code that allows for a remote code exploit.

item.title: CVE-2022-1521|2024-09-16T18:49:44.786Z -- illumina -- nextseq%20550dx
item.description: LRM does not implement authentication or authorization by default. A malicious actor can inject, replay, modify, and/or intercept sensitive data.
